body:
This PR adds a few tests that are bloomfilter-related:
1. Tests p2p message `msg_mempool`: a node that has `peerbloomfilters` disabled should disconnect the peer (already tested [here](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/test/functional/p2p_mempool.py)) but, if enabled, it should send its mempool.
2. Tests that peers with [`fRelay=False`](https://github.com/bitcoin/bips/blob/master/bip-0037.mediawiki#extensions-to-existing-messages) in the `version` message should not receive any invs until it sets the filter with a `filterload` message. The rest is the same as whatâs already tested in `p2p_filter.py`.
3. Tests that peers get disconnected if they send `filterload` or `filteradd` p2p messages to a node with bloom filters disabled.
4. Refactor: renames `p2p_mempool.py` to `p2p_nobloomfilter_messages.py`. Reasons:
(1) I put the `msg_mempool` test inside of `p2p_filter.py` (which tests BIP 37 functionality) because it requires bloom filters to be enabled
(2) The expect-disconnect tests for sending messages to a node with `peerbloomfilters=0` fit better with the expect-disconnect `msg_mempool` test in `p2p_mempool.py`.
title: test: msg_mempool, fRelay, and other bloomfilter tests
